mapper.select: SELECT t2.depart_name FROM patrol_task_organization t1 LEFT JOIN sys_depart t2 ON t1.org_code = t2.org_code and t2.del_flag = 0 where t1.task_code = #{taskCode}

SELECT t2.line_code, t1.station_code, t2.sort as stationSort, t3.sort AS lineSort FROM patrol_task_station t1 LEFT JOIN cs_station t2 ON t1.station_code = t2.station_code LEFT JOIN cs_line t3 ON t3.line_code = t2.line_code AND t2.del_flag = 0 AND t3.del_flag = 0 WHERE t1.task_code = #{code} ORDER BY t3.sort asc, t2.sort ASC;
select t1.realname as realname, t1.id, t1.org_code from sys_user t1 where t1.org_code = #{code} and t1.del_flag = 0

SELECT * FROM patrol_task pt WHERE pt.del_flag = 0
and pt.id = #{patrolTaskParam.id}

SELECT t1.* FROM patrol_task t1 where t1.source = 3 and t1.status in (0, 3) and t1.discard_status = 0 and t1.omit_status = 0
and t1.code in ( SELECT pps.task_code FROM patrol_task_station pps JOIN cs_station cs ON pps.station_code = cs.station_code AND cs.del_flag = 0 WHERE pps.del_flag = 0 AND cs.line_code = #{patrolTaskDTO.stationCode} )
and t1.code in ( SELECT pps.task_code FROM patrol_task_station pps WHERE pps.del_flag = 0 and pps.station_code = #{patrolTaskDTO.stationCode} )
and t1.code in (SELECT t2.task_code FROM patrol_task_organization t2 where t2.org_code = #{patrolTaskDTO.orgCode})
and t1.name like concat('%', #{patrolTaskDTO.name}, '%')
and t1.code like concat('%', #{patrolTaskDTO.code}, '%')
and t1.status = #{patrolTaskDTO.status}
and DATE_FORMAT(t1.patrol_date, '%Y-%m-%d') between DATE_FORMAT(#{patrolTaskDTO.dateHead}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{patrolTaskDTO.dateEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and t1.code in
#{item}
order by t1.create_time desc

SELECT cm.major_name FROM cs_major cm WHERE cm.del_flag = 0
AND cm.major_code = #{code}

SELECT cs.system_name FROM cs_subsystem cs WHERE cs.del_flag = 0
AND cs.system_code = #{code}
SELECT su.realname FROM sys_user su WHERE su.del_flag = 0 AND su.id = #{userId}

SELECT line_code FROM cs_station WHERE del_flag = 0
AND station_code = #{stationCode}

SELECT pt.id, pt.`code`, pt.`name` FROM patrol_task_user ptu LEFT JOIN patrol_task pt on ptu.task_code = pt.`code` WHERE DATE_FORMAT(ptu.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d') and ptu.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT sd.depart_name AS orgName, sd.id AS orgId, sd.org_code AS orgCode FROM sys_depart sd WHERE
sd.id IN
#{item}
GROUP BY sd.depart_name, sd.org_code
select a.line_name as name, a.line_code as code from cs_station a left join cs_user_station c on c.station_id = a.id where c.user_id = #{id}
select a.system_name as name, a.system_code as code from cs_subsystem a left join cs_user_subsystem c on c.system_id = a.id where c.user_id = #{id}
select a.id as id, a.org_code as code, a.depart_name as name, a.org_category as orgCategory from sys_depart a where a.manager_id = #{id}
select a.id as id, a.org_code as code, a.depart_name as name, a.org_category as orgCategory from sys_depart a where org_code_cc LIKE CONCAT('%', #{orgCode}, '%') and a.org_category in (3, 4, 5)

SELECT SUM(IF(pt.STATUS = 7, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, pt.begin_time, IF(1 = pt.auditor, pt.auditor_time, pt.submit_time)), 0)) as workHours, sd.id as orgId, pt.id AS taskId FROM patrol_task pt JOIN patrol_task_user ptu ON pt.`code` = ptu.task_code JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = ptu.user_id JOIN sys_depart sd ON sd.id = su.org_id
and ptu.user_id in
#{item}
and DATE_FORMAT(pt.patrol_date, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and pt.`status` = 7 GROUP BY pt.id

SELECT SUM(IF(pt.STATUS = 7, TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, pt.begin_time, IF(1 = pt.auditor, pt.auditor_time, pt.submit_time)), 0)) as workHours, sd.id as orgId, pt.id AS taskId FROM patrol_task pt JOIN patrol_task_device ptd ON pt.id = ptd.task_id JOIN patrol_accompany pa ON ptd.patrol_number = pa.task_device_code JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = pa.user_id JOIN sys_depart sd ON sd.id = su.org_id
AND pa.user_id IN
#{item}
and DATE_FORMAT(pt.patrol_date, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and pt.`status` = 7 GROUP BY pt.id

SELECT sd.id as orgId, pt.id AS taskId FROM patrol_task pt JOIN patrol_task_user ptu ON pt.`code` = ptu.task_code JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = ptu.user_id JOIN sys_depart sd ON sd.id = su.org_id
and ptu.user_id in
#{item}
and DATE_FORMAT(pt.patrol_date, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and pt.abnormal_state = 1 GROUP BY pt.id

SELECT sd.id as orgId, pt.id AS taskId FROM patrol_task pt JOIN patrol_task_device ptd ON pt.id = ptd.task_id JOIN patrol_accompany pa ON ptd.patrol_number = pa.task_device_code JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = pa.user_id JOIN sys_depart sd ON sd.id = su.org_id
AND pa.user_id IN
#{item}
and DATE_FORMAT(pt.patrol_date, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and pt.abnormal_state = 1 GROUP BY pt.id

select t1.*, (select realname from sys_user where id = t1.end_user_id) as endUserName, concat(DATE_FORMAT(t1.start_time, '%H:%i'), "-", DATE_FORMAT(t1.end_time, '%H:%i')) as startEndTime from patrol_task t1 where t1.del_flag = 0
and t1.id = #{id}
SELECT *from `temperature_humidity` where DATE_SUB(#{date},INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(create_time) AND create_time <= #{date} order by create_time desc
